example.name: transitive
example.text: It [*EXP*-2] was hard [*] to see how photosynthesis would ever happen in South Gardens without [*] decking the walls in a Christmas-like array of Gro-Lites [*T*-1] .

example.name: participle
example.text: Mr. Roman , by contrast , seems [*-1] rarely to cut loose at all , although he did appear at Ogilvy 's Halloween party Friday [*-2] decked out in duck feet and a duck hat , [*-3] costumed as a `` lame duck . ''
